children.value: This is a post showing MDX in action. This starter now comes with MDX out-of-the-box!

// you can write JSX in your Markdown!
<button>test</button>
You can also import custom React components locally. Make sure
as relative paths will not work.

// Import custom component
import Button from "src/components/button"
MDX lets you write JSX embedded inside markdown, perfect for technical blogs. MDX works with Gatsby through
. You can learn more about it in the Gatsby docs:
export const _frontmatter = {"title":"MDX!","date":"2019-10-22","description":"A post showing MDX in action"}
